text: Putin's palace. History of world's largest bribe is a 2021 Russian documentary movie made by the Anti-Corruption Foundation (FBK). The documentary is about the building of "Putin's Palace". Putin said that he did not own the palace. He said that this palace was created for foreign services and was built for scenery. He said that the movie is a fake. == References == Category:2020s documentary movies Category:Russian movies Category:Anti-Corruption Foundation Category:Movies set in palaces
title: Putin's Palace (movie)
